titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to enter into building leasing agreements.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture (USDA) to enter into certain building leasing agreements.
